column4: does anyone know if a s3 savage graphics card would allow compiz to work and simulate 3d desktop effects
I haven't been able to get it to work yet
is it possible or have you read anything that allows s3 savage to work with compiz
no, but I haven't looked around too hard either since it isn't really my thing
